name: Shaker_Series_48-inch_Wall_Cabinet
reviews: I am a pretty good weekend carpenter/cabinet maker and bought this cabinet because i was in a hurry to finish a room that I was working on. The doors are maple, one door is pretty straight, one door is warped. The warped door was not assembled on a flat surface. There were (2) "bungs" missing from the assembly screw holes in the cabinet side. One door was missing the hardware, hinges, screws and knob. There were "dings" in the side frame and chips missing at the screw holes. Other than the items described above, the cabinet was perfect! The workmanship was awful, and that is being kind.
description:
This sleek Shaker Series cabinet mounts on the wall with built-in cleats for an easy installation. This durable wall cabinet is perfect for a medicine, spice or storage cabinet. 
Four (4) fully adjustable glass shelvesConcealed hingesUndrilled for knob/handle for versatile mountingOverall dimensions: 49.5 inches high x 15.25 inches wide x 3-1/4 inches deep2.5 inches interior depthNatural pine finishCan be painted or stainedSolid maple doorsMaterialWoodTypeWall CabinetFinishNatural Finish
